GetLayerCollisionMask.summary: Get the collision layer mask that indicates which layer(s) the specified layer can collide with.
GetLayerCollisionMask.param: The layer to retrieve the collision layer mask for.
GetLayerCollisionMask.returns: A mask where each bit indicates a layer and wether it can collide with layer or not.
GetLayerCollisionMask.exception: The layer is out of range of specified layers (between 0 and 31).

SetLayerCollisionMask.summary: Set the collision layer mask that indicates which layer(s) the specified layer can collide with.
SetLayerCollisionMask.param: The layer to set the collision layer mask for.
A mask where each bit indicates a layer and wether it can collide with layer or not.
SetLayerCollisionMask.exception: The layer is out of range of specified layers (between 0 and 31).
